transportAdvice: Da Nang has a limited public bus network that covers some tourist areas, but most visitors rely on taxis or motorbike taxis for getting around; the city is generally too spread out for walking between major attractions, though the beachfront strip and city center are manageable on foot. Taxis are widely available and affordable, and motorbike rentals are a popular option for independent exploration.

weather.description: Cool and occasionally overcast with some rain, making it one of the cooler months for beach visits.
Conditions begin to improve with less rain and warmer temperatures, pleasant for sightseeing.
Warm and mostly dry with good sunshine, an excellent time to visit beaches and outdoor attractions.
Hot and largely dry with plenty of sunshine, ideal for beach holidays.
Very hot with minimal rainfall, great beach weather though midday heat can be intense.
Peak summer heat with low rain and calm seas, the most popular month for beach tourism.
Hot and sunny with very little rain, excellent conditions for water sports and beach activities.
Still hot but humidity rises and occasional tropical storms can bring brief heavy showers.
The rainy season begins in earnest with frequent heavy downpours and a risk of typhoons.
The wettest month of the year with persistent heavy rain and potential for flooding; outdoor plans may be disrupted.
Still quite wet with lingering rain from the monsoon season, though conditions gradually begin to ease late in the month.
Cooler and drier than the preceding months, with improving conditions toward the end of the year.
